name: Unity Chan's Infinite Run of Fun
name_original: Unity Chan's Infinite Run of Fun
description:
A quick infinite runner game made for Procjam 2016 starring Unity Chan!

Play as Unity Chan in a 2D infinite runner game!

Controls:

Use the left mouse button to click on the text to make selections on the Menu and Game Over Screens

W or Up arrow key = Jump

S or Down arrow key = Slide

Try to run as long as you can and get the highest score!
